languages.text: "Как бы ты ни прикрывал{mf|ся|ась} Патентом — я вижу тебя насквозь. Однажды ты оступишься, и тогда, можешь не сомневаться, я буду рядом. Карающей дланью Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Как бы ты ни прикрывал{mf|ся|ась} Патентом — я вижу тебя насквозь. Однажды ты оступишься, и тогда — можешь не сомневаться — я буду рядом. Карающей дланью Лекс Империалис".

languages.text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."
languages.original_text: "Как бы ты ни прикрывал{mf|ся|ась} Патентом — я вижу тебя насквозь. Однажды ты оступишься, и тогда, можешь не сомневаться, я буду рядом. Карающей дланью Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."
"Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."
"Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."
"Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."
"Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: "Versteckt Euch meinetwegen hinter dem Handelsbrief ... ich durchschaue Euch. Eines Tages werdet Ihr einen Fehler machen und dann werde ich da sein, das versichere ich Euch. Die strafende Hand des Lex Imperia."
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Versteckt Euch meinetwegen hinter dem Handelsbrief ... ich durchschaue Euch. Eines Tages werdet Ihr einen Fehler machen und dann werde ich da sein, das versichere ich Euch. Die strafende Hand des Lex Imperia."

languages.text: « Vous avez beau vous cacher derrière la lettre de marque, je vois clair dans votre jeu. Vous finirez par faire une erreur et ce jour-là, la main punitive de la Lex Imperialis s'abattra sur vous. »
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez beau vous cacher derrière la lettre de marque, je vois clair dans votre jeu. Vous finirez par faire une erreur et ce jour-là, la main punitive de la Lex Imperialis s'abattra sur vous. »

languages.text: “就算你继续躲在神圣授状后面也没用，我一眼就能看穿你。总有一天你会犯错，我保证到时候我会等着你，帝国法典的惩罚之手会等着你。"
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “就算你继续躲在神圣授状后面也没用，我一眼就能看穿你。总有一天你会犯错，我保证到时候我会等着你，帝国法典的惩罚之手会等着你。"

languages.text: «Ocúltese tras la Patente cuanto quiera; puedo ver sus intenciones. Un día cometerá un error, y puede estar segur{mf|o|a} de que estaré allí para verlo. Seré la mano que ejecutará el castigo de la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Ocúltese tras la Patente cuanto quiera; puedo ver sus intenciones. Un día cometerá un error, y puede estar segur{mf|o|a} de que estaré allí para verlo. Seré la mano que ejecutará el castigo de la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: 「好きなだけ令状の陰に隠れてればいい。お前の本性は全部見えてる。いつか必ずお前は過ちを犯す。その時は俺が現れるから安心しとけよ。レックス・インペリアの裁きの手としてな」
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「好きなだけ令状の陰に隠れてればいい。お前の本性は全部見えてる。いつか必ずお前は過ちを犯す。その時は俺が現れるから安心しとけよ。レックス・インペリアの裁きの手としてな」

languages.text: "Ruhsatname'nin ardına istediğin kadar saklan. Tüm çıplaklığınla seni görüyorum. Bir gün hata yapacaksın, o zaman orada olacağım. Lex İmperialis'in cezalandırıcı eli."
languages.original_text: "Hide behind the Warrant all you want — I can see right through you. One day you will make a mistake, and then, rest assured, I will be there. The punishing hand of the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhsatname'nin ardına istediğin kadar saklan. Tüm çıplaklığınla seni görüyorum. Bir gün hata yapacaksın, o zaman orada olacağım. Lex İmperialis'in cezalandırıcı eli."
